name: Throw yourself at me
description:
Throw Yourself At Me is a 1 player skeleton survival brawler
throw your bones at the coming skeletons to last a bit longer

WARNING : CONTAINS FLASHING IMAGES

Playing with a gamepad is strongly advised but you can also use a keyboard

CONTROLS : 

Move with left joystick / arrow keys
Attack with A / Space

don't get hit by the skeletons,
walk on the bones laying around to get your arms back (or your legs)

survive

Music by @Boordaf

sfx are from FreeSound's users :

apolloaiello
EcoDTR
spookymodem
soundscalpel.com
debsound
cliftonmcarlson
lendrick

(mostly bone cracking sounds and growls)
